input:
Bob is rough. Bob is round. Charlie is blue. Charlie is cold. Charlie is red. Charlie is smart. Gary is blue. Gary is cold. Gary is furry. Gary is red. Gary is smart. Harry is blue. Harry is cold. Harry is red. Harry is rough. Harry is round. If Bob is rough and Bob is red then Bob is round. All furry people are smart. If someone is round and furry then they are smart. If someone is smart and round then they are blue. If someone is round and rough then they are red. If someone is round and furry then they are rough. Red, round people are furry. If Bob is red and Bob is not smart then Bob is not blue. All rough, blue people are cold. Question: Bob is not cold.?

universe u

constant obj : Type u

constant Bob : obj
constant Charlie : obj
constant Gary : obj
constant Harry : obj

constant Rough : obj → Prop
constant Round : obj → Prop
constant Blue : obj → Prop
constant Cold : obj → Prop
constant Red : obj → Prop
constant Smart : obj → Prop
constant Furry : obj → Prop

axiom T1 : Rough Bob
axiom T2 : Round Bob
axiom T3 : Blue Charlie
axiom T4 : Cold Charlie
axiom T5 : Red Charlie
axiom T6 : Smart Charlie
axiom T7 : Blue Gary
axiom T8 : Cold Gary
axiom T9 : Furry Gary
axiom T10 : Red Gary
axiom T11 : Smart Gary
axiom T12 : Blue Harry
axiom T13 : Cold Harry
axiom T14 : Red Harry
axiom T15 : Rough Harry
axiom T16 : Round Harry

axiom R1 : Rough Bob ∧ Red Bob → Round Bob
axiom R2 : ∀ x : obj, Furry x → Smart x
axiom R3 : ∀ x : obj, Round x ∧ Furry x → Smart x
axiom R4 : ∀ x : obj, Smart x ∧ Round x → Blue x
axiom R5 : ∀ x : obj, Round x ∧ Rough x → Red x
axiom R6 : ∀ x : obj, Round x ∧ Furry x → Rough x
axiom R7 : ∀ x : obj, Red x ∧ Round x → Furry x
axiom R8 : Red Bob ∧ ¬ Smart Bob → ¬ Blue Bob
axiom R9 : ∀ x : obj, Rough x ∧ Blue x → Cold x

theorem bob_is_not_cold : ¬ Cold Bob :=
begin
  sorry,
end
output:
theorem bob_is_not_cold : ¬ Cold Bob :=
begin
  intro H,
  apply R8,
  split,
  apply R5,
  split,
  exact T2,
  apply R6,
  split,
  exact T2,
  apply R7,
  split,
  apply R5,
  split,
  exact T2,
  exact T1,
  exact T1,
  apply R4,
  split,
  apply R2,
  apply R7,
  split,
  apply R5,
  split,
  exact T2,
  exact T1,
  exact T2,
  exact H,
end

-- The answer is True
